definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to have no strength/to feel weak/feeling listless
erhua variant of 沒有勁頭|没有劲头[mei2 you3 jin4 tou2]

sentences.english: He gathered up his strength for the new job.
sentences.chinese: 他鼓足劲头来开展新的工作。

sentences.english: I think we''ll have more drive under him.
sentences.chinese: 我认为，在他的领导下我们会更有劲头。

sentences.english: Charles is such a gasser when he gets going about himself.
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯一谈到自己，就劲头十足，滔滔不绝。

sentences.english: As for getting a feel for the life of locals, Wang Yuanyuan has more enthusiasm than me.
sentences.chinese: 要说感受市民的生活，王渊源的劲头儿可比我要大。

sentences.english: Listening to her and seeing the way of her talking with men really turns my stomach.
sentences.chinese: 听她讲话，看她和男人讲话的那股劲头儿真让我恶心。

sentences.english: Among the five subjects, Jiang learnt English most industriously.
sentences.chinese: 这五科当中，姜浩学英语的劲头是最足的。

sentences.english: Over the next few years, my work gained momentum.
sentences.chinese: 随后几年里，我的工作劲头更足。

sentences.english: Good teamwork requires a group of motivated people.
sentences.chinese: 杰出的团队工作需要有一组劲头实足的成员。

sentences.english: He is a man of push and goes in his career.
sentences.chinese: 他对自己的事业劲头十足。

sentences.english: But I still drive to perform the full duty, indomitable.
sentences.chinese: 但我仍然劲头十足地履行天职，不屈不挠。

sentences.english: Old as he is, he works as energetically as young people.
sentences.chinese: 他虽然上了年纪，干起活来跟年轻人的劲头一样大。

sentences.english: What is meant by "a person full of juice"?
sentences.chinese: “一个充满果汁的人”是说这个人劲头十足。

sentences.english: Harry is such a gasbag when he gets going about himself.
sentences.chinese: 一谈到自己，哈里就会夸夸其谈，劲头十足。

sentences.english: The body is revolutionary capital, healthy study energy talent is higher.
sentences.chinese: 身体是革命的本钱，身体健康学习劲头儿才更高。

sentences.english: He always works like a tiger.
sentences.chinese: 他工作起来总是劲头十足。

sentences.english: In turn, they disparaged our elitism and urban mores.
sentences.chinese: 相应的，他们也蔑视我们的优越劲头和城市做派。

definition: to exert all one's force/all-out effort/CL:股[gu3]
lit. newborn calves do not fear tigers (idiom)/fig. the young are fearless
pinyin: chu1 sheng1 niu2 du2 bu4 pa4 hu3

definition: to throw off inhibitions/to go all out
to strive for mastery (idiom); aiming for the best result/to have high ambitions
